attributes.action: Amend petition standards to allow public votes of no confidence in an MP.
attributes.additional_details: It would allow the public to express their opinion directly.
attributes.background:
Currently "petitions calling for someone to resign and petitions asking for a vote of no confidence in an individual Minister or the Government as a whole" are not allowed. 

Amend this to allow the public to express their lack of confidence in an individual Minister or the government as a whole.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608550
